amendment.description: To prohibit funds from being used for earmarks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4990 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 64. Record Vote Number: 76.

action.text: Amendment SA 4990 proposed by Senator Braun. (consideration: CR S1107; text: CR S1107) To prohibit funds from being used for earmarks.
